title: Announcement Response
description: The status information returned from MMDDF application

name.description: The name of the announcement which is be announced by MMDDF

mcastAddress.description: The IP address used for the multicast of the broker document/software announcement

mcastPort.description: The port number used for the multicast of the broker document/ software announcement

status.description: The boolean value denotes the status of the given announcement returned from MMDDF
